title: Why did the patch notes lie?
body:
Youmuu's does not ignore unit collision
Fervor doesn't give a stack  if you use an ability
Dirk has 10 lethality
The cooldown on fresh blood is 6 not 9

????????

replies.body: Fervor does stack, it doesn't display it anymore, it just flat out raises your AD

I am aware of this. The patch notes say you get a stack for using an ability and 2 stacks for auto attacking. In game rigt now you ONLY get stacks for auto attacking abilities don't give 1 stack like the patch notes say.
2 for melees, 1 for ranged. It's right there.
Abilities are still supposed to give 1 stack. They do not currently.
I used it in a match earlier and it worked fine for me. Strange.
